page.title: 11Wem Sports and Social Club 1
page.content: In June 1966, some people called a public meeting to see if there was enough support for a sports club. There was. The town council let the new club rent the Bowen's Field ground and also let them rent the recreation ground. At Bowen's Field there is a football pitch,a hockey pitch,a hard surface with netting and floodlights for evening activities like 5 a side football. A bowling green is now being built. There is a swimming pool that was looked after by the Sports and Social club but it was too expensive to run so the North Shropshire District Council now run it. In 1979 they built a clubhouse and it is open from 8 till 11 nightly. The clubroom is also used by groups like an aerobics course and a pre_school group. The rec. has a football pitch that can be rented for Â£6.50 a match.
